item.description: Since we have a lot of musically inclined people in the group, and also just seem to love the Bean, let's go cheer on or participate in the monthly open mic night! Signups begin at 6.30, so if you're planning to sing/play, you should get there early to get on the roster. Full information for the Bean can be found here: http://www.thevanilla... For anyone who hasn't been there before, the Bean is a small cafe which serves tasty food and drink in a casual, folky atmosphere.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Open Microphone Night @ The Vanilla Bean Cafe
